title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 251.5 - Notice of pending petitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 251.5 - Notice of pending petitions

State Regulations

Upon the filing of a petition under section 705 of SERA, notice thereof, including the date when such petition was filed, the name and
address of the employer affected and the nature of his business, the unit
claimed to be appropriate and the name of the person or organization filing the
same, shall be maintained by an agent of the board on a public docket kept by
the board at its principal office. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12

251.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
